title:
Please tell me why (if you can) the sherriffs dept closed both north and southbound lanes of I40 last night to investigate the death of that stupid idiot that jumped to his death.  I realise they are searching for evidence but did they think that said moron hit the road so hard that the splat made something of relevence fly approximately 40 ft to the other side of the highway?  This is becoming more of a problem.  MOVE VEHICLES AND PEOPLE OUT OF THE WAY INCLUDING EMERGENCY VEHICLES WHICH ARE 11 TIMES OUT OF 10 THE MAIN VEHICLES IN THE WAY.  Let other people get on with their day  some of us don\'t care about others!  Yes you can quote me if you wish and use my e-mail address publicly.

Thankyou in advance,  Glenn
